com.ihealth.communication.contol

Class Hs4sControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.contol.Hs4sControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Hs4sControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the HS4s bluetooth

    The class provides methods to control HS4s device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a HS4s device, you need to call iHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new HS4s device, and then call iHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect HS4s device.
